name: Initial P: A Priest and Two Deacons before an Altar
description: Initial P: A Priest and Two Deacons before an Altar; Unknown; Lyon, France; begun after 1234 - completed before 1262; Tempera colors and gold leaf on parchment; Leaf: 24.8 x 16.7 cm (9 3/4 x 6 9/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig V 5, fol. 108; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Initial P: A Priest and Two Deacons before an Altar
medium: Tempera colors and gold leaf on parchment
